column2: "Sorry for calling you here. It's about that weapon I was fixing."
"I'll start with the conclusion: someone stole it. Still no leads as to who it was."
"Someone must have slipped into my workshop during that Darker attack the other day."
"However, they didn't take any completed weapons, blueprints, or data. Only that weapon."
"The repairs weren't quite complete. It has the right shape, but in this condition, it's still impossible to use."
"But that should be obvious from looking at it. Why would someone steal it, I have no idea."
"But I have a really bad feeling about this."
"When I was fixing it, I had this feeling like someone was lurking around."
"At any rate, I apologize. You trusted me with that weapon, and I lost it. I feel really miserable."
"But, what is the deal with it? And why would someone steal it?"
"I have still have no idea. Just an unsettling feeling about it."
